Reviews.Title: Great replacement for the stock battery or as an extra.
Reviews.Author: M.R.E "M. E wilderness"
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly with a Lumix G5. It also has slightly higher mah for longer life than the stock battery. Price is great.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 1 Halcyon Brand Battery
Battery Specs: 1600 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BLC12 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Panasonic Lumix DMC-G5KK 16.1MP Mirrorless Camera and Panasonic DMW-BLC12
